sentences.en: I've been to see an internist, a nutritionist, and a chiropractor.
sentences.cn: 我已经求诊过一位内科医生、一位营养学家和一位按摩师了。

sentences.en: Plotnikoff, an internist, speaks Somali and has many Somali patients.
sentences.cn: 他是一位内科医师, 讲索马里语,有很多索马里病人.

trans.tran_en: a doctor who has a general knowledge about all illnesses and medical conditions of organs inside your body, and who treats illnesses that do not need operations
